description.displayText:
Anjali has been babysitting my kids now 6 and 4 years old for last two years. Whenever I need a babysitter, Anjali is the first person I call. 
My kids absolutely love her and always get excited when they learn that Anjali is going to spend time with them. Anjali is very responsible and engaging. She is always on time and is very trustworthy with kids. She keeps my kids engaged with art and craft activities and other things that they love. I really appreciate her spending time with my kids. Thank you Anjali!
